details.publicNotes: A heavy-set bipedal shaggy creature of canine or hyena descent bares its jagged teeth at you, a heavy pick held firmly in paws just a little too large for its frame at the end of sinewed arms. Distracting from its physical prowess are a small collection of scattered gemstones woven into its fur.

description.value: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
The nature of this leather armor is unclear.
A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
This pick has a longer handle and broader head than a regular pick. It is too heavy to wield in one hand.
The nature of this greatpick is unclear.
This pick has a longer handle and broader head than a regular pick. It is too heavy to wield in one hand.
The gem gnoll burrows up to 15 feet straight up then makes a Strike.

Trigger The war leader takes damage and is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}

EffectÂ The war leader flies into a frenzy for one minute, gaining a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +4 status bonus to damage rolls. After this they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

With a quick sprint and likely a blood-hungry yell, they dash up to their foe and swing. Stride twice. If they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.Â
